scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules && npm run clean:client:modules && npm run clean:server:modules && npm run clean:common:modules
scripts.deploy-assets: npm run build:client && rm -rf demo-server/public && cp -a demo-client/dist demo-server/public
scripts.install: npm run install:client && npm run install:server && npm run install:common
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run build:common:watch" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
